Articles.Content: Sorry if there is already a thread for this but I want to see your motherships. My sorta Constellation craft is still being built.

Well, here's my stock MTV if that counts.

![vPfCEHX.png](http://i.imgur.com/vPfCEHX.png)

![NUNFcIQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/NUNFcIQ.png)
This puts my constellation craft to shame, even though it isn't meant to be a replica

Here is an old one of mine. Probably doesn't still work.

![rayGqB1.png](http://i.imgur.com/rayGqB1.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0lIjT)

Duna Transit
THere's a thread called "Dems muddaships" for this, but I haven't seen activity there in quite some time. Not sure whether it was a good idea to start up a new one but it certainly wasnt a bad move.
Yeah, there is technically already at least two threads as far as I remember, but we may as well leave this one up and call it the "1.0 Motherships Thread"

Oh yeah, I forgot to post this here. WIP.

[![VnDSZwem.png](http://i.imgur.com/VnDSZwem.png)](http://imgur.com/VnDSZwe.png)[![XVzLTD6m.png](http://i.imgur.com/XVzLTD6m.png)](http://imgur.com/XVzLTD6.png)

[![MbQ5zdR.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MbQ5zdR.jpg)](http://imgur.com/MbQ5zdR)

I thought you'd got a new, larger Alcubierre drive mod.

I was simultaneously impressed by your building skills and depressed by there not being a warp drive mod for large vessels.
